subject: PGA Championship
Golf
lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson, coming off a tough finish at last week’s W.G.C.-Bridgestone Invitational, got off to a rough start in the first round of the P.G.A. Championship.
snippet: Phil Mickelson, coming off a tough finish at last week’s W.G.C.-Bridgestone Invitational, got off to a rough start in the first round of the P.G.A. Championship.
